import React,{useState} from "react" import ts from "./Tasks.module.css"; import TaskShowDetailsIcon from "./TaskShowDetailsIcon"; import TaskHideDetailsIcon from "./TaskHideDetails"; const TaskDetails = (props) => { let [ShowDetails, SetShowDetails] = useState(false) const ShowDetailsON = () => { SetShowDetails(true) props.ShowButtonBlockedON() } const ShowDetailsOFF = () => { SetShowDetails(false) props.ShowButtonBlockedOFF() } return
{ShowDetails ?
